translated: As it is said:ğŸ”½â€œThey are produced by karma and cease at the end of the eon of destruction.â€ğŸ”½Since there is no cessation as imagined by the tÄ«rthikas, it is called â€œnoncessation.â€

original: las kyis bskyed pa dag 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i mthar 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes yongs su brtags pa lta bu'i 'gag pa med pa'i phyir 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po rnams la rnam pa thams cad du 'gag pa med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: las kyis bskyed pa dag 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i mthar 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes yongs su brtags pa lta bu'i 'gag pa med pa'i phyir 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po rnams la rnam pa thams cad du 'gag pa med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: However, it is not the case that all things are completely devoid of cessation.

original: de lta bas na dngos po rnams rang gi ngang gis skad cig skad cig la 'gag pa ni yod do //
analyzed: de lta bas na dngos po rnams rang gi ngang gis skad cig skad cig la 'gag pa ni yod do //
translated: Therefore, things do exist that cease moment by moment by their very nature.ğŸ”½This is like the nonexistence of a self.

original: bdag med pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di yang dpe ste /ğŸ”½dper na mu stegs byed dag gis bdag gi dngos po lus sam /
analyzed: bdag med pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di yang dpe ste / dper na mu stegs byed dag gis bdag gi dngos po lus sam /
translated: This is an example.

original: mthe bo 'am nas 'bru'am khre rgod dam 'bras thug po che la sogs pa'i bong tshod tsam gyi nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu yod par khas blangs pa'i bdag de med kyang phung po lnga'i bdag nyid med pa ma yin pa bzhin du dngos po rnams kyi 'gagğŸ”½pa med pa yang de bzhin du blta'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: mthe bo 'am nas 'bru'am khre rgod dam 'bras thug po che la sogs pa'i bong tshod tsam gyi nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu yod par khas blangs pa'i bdag de med kyang phung po lnga'i bdag nyid med pa ma yin pa bzhin du dngos po rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa yang de bzhin du blta'o zhes zer ro //
translated: For example, even though the self that is accepted by the tÄ«rthikas as existing internally in the body, or in the thumb, or in the size of a grain of rice, or in the size of a wheat berry, or in the size of a mung bean, or in the size of a chickpea, and so on, does not exist, it is not the case that the five aggregates do not exist.ğŸ”½In the same way, the cessation of things should be viewed as not existing.

original: chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa ni zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs te /
analyzed: chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa ni zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs te /
translated: This is a position.

original: gsung rab las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni'o //
analyzed: gsung rab las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni'o //
translated: The basis of the distinction is dependent origination, and the distinction is that it is not annihilated and not eternal.

original: rgyu la brten te 'bras bu skye zhing 'bras bu skye ba na rgyu 'gag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs kyi chos te /
analyzed: rgyu la brten te 'bras bu skye zhing 'bras bu skye ba na rgyu 'gag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs kyi chos te /
translated: The reason is that the effect arises in dependence on the cause and when the effect arises, the cause ceases.ğŸ”½This is the property of the subject.

original: 'di ltar chad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid yin na /ğŸ”½gang gi phyir rgyu la brten te rgyu'i stobs kyis 'bras bu skye ba de ni rgyun 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid skye ba yin pa de'i phyir chad pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar chad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid yin na / gang gi phyir rgyu la brten te rgyu'i stobs kyis 'bras bu skye ba de ni rgyun 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid skye ba yin pa de'i phyir chad pa med pa yin na /
translated: In this regard, annihilation is the characteristic of a non-continuous continuum.ğŸ”½Since the effect arises by the power of the cause in dependence on the cause, it is the characteristic of a continuous continuum. Therefore, it is not annihilated.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu skye ba skye ba'i dus nyid na mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'gag pa de'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu skye ba skye ba'i dus nyid na mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'gag pa de'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no //
translated: Since the cause ceases at the time the effect arises, it is not eternal.

original: zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zhes zer ro //
translated: This is what they say.

original: 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa ni zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs te /
analyzed: 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa ni zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs te /
translated: Non-coming and non-going are also a position.

original: gsung rab las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa zhes bya ba ni'o //
analyzed: gsung rab las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa zhes bya ba ni'o //
translated: The scriptures state that dependent origination is a special basis, and the special attributes are non-coming and non-going.ğŸ”½Non-coming and non-going are also a position.

original: skyes pa'i yul nyid du 'jig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs kyi chos te /
analyzed: skyes pa'i yul nyid du 'jig pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs kyi chos te /
translated: The attribute of the position is because it is destroyed in the very place it arises.

original: 'di ltar yul gang nas yul gzhan du 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po 'gag pa yang med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar yul gang nas yul gzhan du 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po 'gag pa yang med de /
translated: Thus, the state of coming from one place to another and going to another place does not cease.

original: gang skye ba de ni skyes pa'i yul de nyid du 'jig pas gzhan du 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dang / gang yul gzhan du skye ba de yang skyes pa na skyes pa'i yul gzhan de nyid du 'jig pas 'dir 'ong pa med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa yin no @56a * //
analyzed: gang skye ba de ni skyes pa'i yul de nyid du 'jig pas gzhan du 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dang / gang yul gzhan du skye ba de yang skyes pa na skyes pa'i yul gzhan de nyid du 'jig pas 'dir 'ong pa med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa yin no @56a * //
translated: Because that which arises is destroyed in the very place it arises, it does not go elsewhere and because that which arises in another place is destroyed in the very place it arises, it does not come here.

original: zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore it is said that dependent origination is non-coming and non-going.

original: don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa ni zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs te /
analyzed: don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa ni zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs te /
translated: The phrase â€œnot having the same meaning and not having different meaningsâ€ is also a premise.

original: gsung rab las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni'o //
analyzed: gsung rab las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni'o //
translated: The phrase â€œnot having the same meaning and not having different meaningsâ€ is a quality of the subject that is mentioned in the scriptures.ğŸ”½The phrase â€œbecause it is not tenable to say that it is the same as or different from thoseâ€ is also a premise.ğŸ”½The phrase â€œbecause it is not tenable to say that it is the same as or different from thoseâ€ is a quality of the subject that is mentioned in the scriptures.

original: de nyid dang gzhan du brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs kyi chos te /ğŸ”½'di ltar dngos po rgyu rkyen gang las byung ba de ni rgyu rkyen de dang gcig pa nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan du brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba 'di yang phyogs kyi chos te / 'di ltar dngos po rgyu rkyen gang las byung ba de ni rgyu rkyen de dang gcig pa nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin la /
translated: The phrase â€œbecause it is not tenable to say that it is the same as or different from thoseâ€ is also a premise.

original: de dang tha dad pa nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang tha dad pa nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, a thing that arises from causes and conditions is not tenable as being the same as those causes and conditions and it is not tenable as being different from them. Therefore, it does not have the same meaning and it does not have different meanings.

original: nor bu'am bud shing ngam nyi ma dang phrad pa las byung ba'i me bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di yang dpe ste /
analyzed: nor bu'am bud shing ngam nyi ma dang phrad pa las byung ba'i me bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di yang dpe ste /

analyzed: dper na nor bu me shel dang phrad pa las byung ba'i me'am /

original: bud shing dang phrad pa las byung ba'i me'am /
analyzed: bud shing dang phrad pa las byung ba'i me'am /

original: nyi ma dang phrad pa las byung ba'i me gang yin pa de ni nor bu dang bud shing dang nye ma dag las so sor btsal na /

analyzed: nor bu dang bud shing dang nyi ma dag la med pas de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin la /

original: gang gi phyir me de ni nor bu dang bud shing dang nyi ma'i rkyen las byung bas de tha dad pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir me de ni nor bu dang bud shing dang nyi ma'i rkyen las byung bas de tha dad pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: But because that fire arises from the conditions of the gem, fuel, and the sun, it is not different from them.

analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rigs mthun pa nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin pa bzhin du /

analyzed: de lta bu'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni gsung rab kyi tshul yin pas zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa de lta bu'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bkas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin
translated: Things do not arise from a combination of self and other, nor do they arise by the transformation of self, nor do they arise by the transformation of other.

original: par gsungs pas so //
analyzed: par gsungs pas so //
translated: Things

analyzed: nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid ma yin pa ste zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de lta bu'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni sde snod gsum po dag la yang yod pa de'i phyir nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid

analyzed: thun mong kho na yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: It is shared.ğŸ”½Thus it is not necessary to compose this treatise.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mi dgos so zhes bya ba ni de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa de ni gsung @56b rab kyi tshul yin pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mi dgos so zhes bya ba ni de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa de ni gsung @56b rab kyi tshul yin pas /

analyzed: 'dir dbu ma zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos 'di brtsam mi dgos so zhes zer ba yin no zhes zer ro zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya

analyzed: ba khyad par skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa bstan pa la /
translated: endowed with the special attributes of non-arising, non-cessation, non-annihilation, non-permanence, non-coming, non-going, non-difference, and non-sameness.

analyzed: sangs rgyas pa dag las kha cig blo gros ngan pa'i dra bas g-yogs pa dag don la log par rtogs pas /

original: de ni sna tshogs kyang yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de ni sna tshogs kyang yin mod kyi /
translated: Although it is indeed diverse,ğŸ”½it is not like that.

analyzed: skye ba nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho nar ston pas /
translated: since arising itself is taught to be the very nature of non-arising,

analyzed: de la skye ba nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho nar ston pas zhes bya bas ji skad bstan zhe na /
translated: In that regard, it may be asked, â€œHow is it that since arising itself is taught to be the very nature of non-arising?â€

analyzed: kho bo ni khyed nyan thos mdo sde pas mig dang gzugs rnams la brten te /
translated: We reply: We do not assert that the eye and form are the conditions of the arising of eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / sa bon dang rkyen la brten nas myu gu skye ba la sogs par khas blangs pa gang yin pa'i skye ba de nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho nar ston pa dang / de bzhin du khyed kyis rang gi rang gis 'gags pas 'gag pa yod par khas blangs pa dang /

translated: You accept that cessation exists because things cease by themselves.ğŸ”½You accept that there is no annihilation because effects arise in dependence on causes.

translated: You accept that there is no permanence because the cause ceases when the effect arises.ğŸ”½You accept that there is no coming because the arising object is destroyed in another place.

translated: The treatise was composed because it is necessary to refute the assertion that the effect is not different from the cause, the assertion that the effect is not the same as the cause, and the assertion that the effect is not nonexistent in the cause.ğŸ”½  The treatise was

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa khas len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kho bo ni khyed kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa khas blangs pa nyid /ğŸ”½skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kho nar ston pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa khas len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kho bo ni khyed kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa khas blangs pa nyid / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kho nar ston pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung ba khyad par gyi gzhi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
translated: We teach that your acceptance of arising, ceasing, and so on is precisely the nature of nonarising, nonceasing, and so on.

original: khyad par skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: We accept dependent origination, the basis of those attributes, as it appears in the perfection of wisdom sutras as having the attributes of being unarisen, unceasing, and so on.

original: de ni khyad par shin tu che bas zhes bya ba ni khyed kyi khas blangs pa dang / kho bos khas blangs pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni khyad par shin tu che bas /
analyzed: de ni khyad par shin tu che bas zhes bya ba ni khyed kyi khas blangs pa dang / kho bos khas blangs pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni khyad par shin tu che bas /
translated: Since there is a great difference between the dependent origination accepted by you and the dependent origination accepted by us,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa de ni nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa de ni nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pas so //
translated: That dependent origination endowed with the special features of non-arising and so forth, which occurs in the Perfection of Wisdom, is not shared in common with the Sravakas.ğŸ”½Therefore, it is not the case that the treatise is not necessary.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mi dgos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de ltar gang gi phyir khyad par shin tu che bas nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa de'i phyir 'dir slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyis dbu ma zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mi dgos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de ltar gang gi phyir khyad par shin tu che bas nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa de'i phyir 'dir slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyis dbu ma zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos
translated: This is to say, since it is not shared in common with the Sravakas because of its extremely great distinction, therefore, the treatise called the â€œCentral Wayâ€ was composed by the Master Nagarjuna.

original: 'di brtsam mi dgos pa ma yin te dgos pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di brtsam mi dgos pa ma yin te dgos pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not the case that it is not necessary; it is necessary, is the meaning.

original: de ltar bstan bcos brtsam mi dgos so zhes zer ba'i lan btab pa dang / 'dir gal te dmigs pa can dag 'di skad ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshanğŸ”½nyid dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar bstan bcos brtsam mi dgos so zhes zer ba'i lan btab pa dang / 'dir gal te dmigs pa can dag 'di skad ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: In response to that, here, if those who perceive this say, â€œThis dependent origination that arises in the perfection of wisdom, which possesses the eight special attributes such as nonarising, is not the word of the Buddha because it lacks the characteristics of dependent origination,

original: dper na grangs can dag la sogs pa'i bstan bcos dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na grangs can dag la sogs pa'i bstan bcos dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no //
translated: like the treatises of the SÄá¹ƒkhya and so on,â€

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
translated: what are the characteristics of dependent origination?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
analyzed: lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
translated: the forward process, the reverse process, and the state of cause and effect.

original: de la lugs su 'byung ba nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lugs su 'byung ba nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the forward process?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis @57b rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis ji skad bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis @57b rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis ji skad bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavÄn has taught the twelve links of dependent origination as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: Namely,

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
translated: conditioned by ignorance are compositional activity,

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
translated: conditioned by compositional activity is consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
translated: conditioned by consciousness is name and form,ğŸ”½conditioned by name and form are the six sense spheres,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /ğŸ”½reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
translated: conditioned by the six sense spheres is contact,ğŸ”½conditioned by contact is feeling,

original: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
translated: conditioned by feeling is craving,

original: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
translated: conditioned by craving is appropriation,

original: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
analyzed: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
translated: conditioned by appropriation is existence,

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
translated: conditioned by existence is birth,

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: and conditioned by birth are aging, death, sorrow, lamentation, suffering, unhappiness, and strife.

original: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this entire great mass of suffering comes to an end.

original: lugs las bzlog pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: lugs las bzlog pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the reverse process?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag / skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag / reg pa 'gagsğŸ”½pas tshor ba 'gag / tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag / skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag / reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag / tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /
translated: With the cessation of ignorance, the karmic forces cease; with the cessation of the karmic forces, consciousness ceases; with the cessation of consciousness, name and form cease; with the cessation of name and form, the six sense fields cease; with the cessation of the six sense fields, contact ceases; with the cessation of contact,

original: sreg pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag / len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag / srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag / skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
analyzed: sreg pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag / len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag / srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag / skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
translated: sensation ceases; with the cessation of sensation, craving ceases; with the cessation of craving, grasping ceases; with the cessation of grasping, becoming ceases; with the cessation of becoming, birth ceases; with the cessation of birth, old age, death, grief, lamentation, suffering, mental anguish, and

original: 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /
translated: disturbance cease.ğŸ”½Thus, this entire great mass of suffering comes to an end.

original: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this great mass of pure suffering ceases.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of cause and effect?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: ma rig pa ni rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: ma rig pa ni rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Ignorance is the nature of the cause.

original: 'du byed la sogs pa yan lag lhag ma bcu gcig po dag ni 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin no //ğŸ”½yang na ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'du byed la sogs pa yan lag lhag ma bcu gcig po dag ni 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin no // yang na ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: The remaining eleven members, beginning with volitional action, are the nature of the effect.ğŸ”½Moreover, ignorance is the nature of the cause of volitional action, and volitional action is the nature of the effect of ignorance.

original: 'du byed rnams ni ma rig pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi 'bras bu'i dngos po @58a * //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni ma rig pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi 'bras bu'i dngos po @58a * //
translated: Volitional action is the nature of the cause of consciousness, and consciousness is the nature of the effect of volitional action.

original: nyid yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: nyid yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Consciousness is the nature of the cause of name-and-form, and name-and-form is the nature of the effect of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ni rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug gi rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug gi rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Name and form is the result of consciousness and the cause of the six sense bases.

original: skye mched drug ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / skye mched drug ni reg pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: skye mched drug ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / skye mched drug ni reg pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: The six sense bases are the result of name and form and the cause of contact.

original: reg pa ni skye mched drug gi 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / reg pa ni tshor ba'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /ğŸ”½tshor ba ni reg pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / tshor ba ni srid pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: reg pa ni skye mched drug gi 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / reg pa ni tshor ba'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la / tshor ba ni reg pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / tshor ba ni srid pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Contact is the result of the six sense bases and the cause of feeling.ğŸ”½Feeling is the result of contact and the cause of craving.ğŸ”½Craving is the cause of grasping and the result of feeling.

original: srid pa ni tshor ba'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / sred pa ni len pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: srid pa ni tshor ba'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / sred pa ni len pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Grasping is the cause of becoming and the result of craving.ğŸ”½Becoming is the cause of birth and the result of grasping.ğŸ”½Birth is the cause of aging and death and the result of becoming.

original: len pa ni sred pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / len pa ni srid pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: len pa ni sred pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / len pa ni srid pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Grasping is the entity that is the result of craving,ğŸ”½and grasping is the entity that is the cause of becoming.

original: srid pa ni len pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang ; srid pa ni skye ba'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: srid pa ni len pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang ; srid pa ni skye ba'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Becoming is the entity that is the result of grasping, and becoming is the entity that is the cause of birth.

original: skye ba ni srid pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / skye ba ni rga shi la sogs pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
analyzed: skye ba ni srid pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa dang / skye ba ni rga shi la sogs pa'i rgyu'i dngos po nyid yin la /
translated: Birth is the entity that is the result of becoming, and birth is the entity that is the cause of aging and death, etc.

original: rga shi la sogs pa ni skye ba'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi la sogs pa ni skye ba'i 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid yin pa'o //
translated: Aging and death, etc., are the entity that is the result of birth.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de dag khyod kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa 'di la med pas /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de dag khyod kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa 'di la med pas /
translated: Since these characteristics of dependent origination do not exist in your dependent origination, which is devoid of arising, etc.,

original: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes zer na /
translated: it is not the word of the Buddha.â€

original: 'dir de'i lan du 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir de'i lan du 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: In response to this, we would say the following:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: The BhagavÄn has said:

original: sdang bas chos rnams mi shes shing //
analyzed: sdang bas chos rnams mi shes shing //
translated: Through hatred one does not understand the Dharma.

original: sdang bas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
analyzed: sdang bas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
translated: Through hatred one does not see the Dharma.

original: mi gang zhe sdang brten pa ni //
analyzed: mi gang zhe sdang brten pa ni //
translated: When a person relies on hatred,

original: de tshe mun pas mun nag 'gyur //ğŸ”½zhes bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de tshe mun pas mun nag 'gyur // zhes bka' stsal pa /
translated: at that time darkness becomes darkness.ğŸ”½This is what the Blessed One said.

original: de ni legs par gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni legs par gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is well said.

original: de'i phyir zhe sdang gi dri ma mang po'i ling tog gis blo gros kyi mig bsgribs pa long ba lta bu khyod kyis kyang /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhe sdang gi dri ma mang po'i ling tog gis blo gros kyi mig bsgribs pa long ba lta bu khyod kyis kyang /
translated: Therefore, you who are like a blind person whose eyes of wisdom are covered by the cataract of many stains of hatred,

original: ston ka'i nam mkha'i dkyil nas shar ba'i zla ba ltar gsal ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid kyi yon tan dang ldan pa 'di yod bzhin du mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ston ka'i nam mkha'i dkyil nas shar ba'i zla ba ltar gsal ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid kyi yon tan dang ldan pa 'di yod bzhin du mi mthong ngo //
translated: do not see this dependent origination, which is clear like the moon rising in the middle of an autumn sky, endowed with the characteristics of arising in forward order, arising in reverse order, and the nature of cause and effect, even though it exists.

original: 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la yang mtshan nyid thams @58b cad yod de /
analyzed: 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la yang mtshan nyid thams @58b cad yod de /
translated: Thus, in this dependent origination, all characteristics exist.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'gag pa dang / skye pa'i rkyen gyis chad pa dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rtag pa dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'ong ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis don tha dad pa dang /
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'gag pa dang / skye pa'i rkyen gyis chad pa dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rtag pa dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'ong ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis don tha dad pa dang /
translated: The arising of the condition of birth is the arising of cessation, the arising of the condition of birth is the arising of annihilation, the arising of the condition of birth is the arising of permanence, the arising of the condition of birth is the arising of coming, the arising of the condition of birth is the arising of going, the arising of the condition of birth is the arising of difference in meaning,

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis don gcig par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis don gcig par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid yin no //
translated: the arising of the condition of birth is the arising of sameness in meaning. This is the arising of the system of affliction.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas chad pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas rtag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas 'ong ba med pa dang / skye ba med pas 'gro ba med pa dang /
analyzed: skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas chad pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas rtag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas 'ong ba med pa dang / skye ba med pas 'gro ba med pa dang /
translated: The non-arising of cessation, the non-arising of annihilation, the non-arising of permanence, the non-arising of coming, the non-arising of going,

original: skye ba med pas don tha dad pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas don gcig pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par byang ba'i lugs las bzlog pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pas don tha dad pa med pa dang / skye ba med pas don gcig pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par byang ba'i lugs las bzlog pa nyid yin no //
translated: the non-arising of difference in meaning, the non-arising of sameness in meaning. This is the arising of the system of purification.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: skye ba med pa yod pas 'gag pa med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas chad pa med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas rtag pa med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas 'ong ba med pa yod pa dang /
analyzed: skye ba med pa yod pas 'gag pa med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas chad pa med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas rtag pa med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas 'ong ba med pa yod pa dang /
translated: Because non-production exists, non-cessation exists; because non-production exists, non-annihilation exists; because non-production exists, non-permanence exists; because non-production exists, non-coming exists;

original: skye ba med pa yod pas 'gro ba med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas don tha dad pa ma yin pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas don gcig pa ma yin pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par byang ba'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pa yod pas 'gro ba med pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas don tha dad pa ma yin pa yod pa dang / skye ba med pa yod pas don gcig pa ma yin pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par byang ba'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid yin no //
translated: because non-production exists, non-going exists; because non-production exists, non-differentiation of objects exists; because non-production exists, non-identity of objects exists. This is the natural outcome of purification.

original: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'dir lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad la khyab pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'dir lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad la khyab pa yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, the eight aspects of dependent origination, such as non-production, are characterized by natural outcome and reversal, and pervade all internal and external things.

original: yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang ; lugs las bzlog pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni nang gi dngos po 'ba' zhig la khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang ; lugs las bzlog pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni nang gi dngos po 'ba' zhig la khyab pa yin te /
translated: The characteristics of the forward and reverse order of the twelve factors pervade only internal things.

original: 'di ltar yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni nang gi dngos po rnams nyi tshe la yod par zad kyi /ğŸ”½phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams la med pa'i phyir dang / 'di'i lugs su 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji ltar nang gi dngos po rnams skyes pa'i rkyen gyis 'gag pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di ltar yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid dang / lugs las bzlog pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni nang gi dngos po rnams nyi tshe la yod par zad kyi / phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams la med pa'i phyir dang / 'di'i lugs su 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji ltar nang gi dngos po rnams skyes pa'i rkyen gyis 'gag pa de bzhin du /
translated: Thus, the characteristics of the forward and reverse order of the twelve factors exist only in relation to internal things.ğŸ”½The characteristics of the forward order of external things do not exist because the characteristics of the forward order of external things are like the cessation of internal things due to the condition of their birth.

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skyes pa'i rkyen gyis kyang 'gag par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / 'di'i lugs las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /ğŸ”½ji ltar nang gi @59a * //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skyes pa'i rkyen gyis kyang 'gag par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / 'di'i lugs las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /ğŸ”½ji ltar nang gi @59a * //
translated: The characteristics of the reverse order of external things do not exist because the characteristics of the reverse order of external things are like the birth of internal things due to the condition of their cessation.

original: dngos po rnams kyi skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa de bzhin du phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyi skye ba med pas kyang 'gag pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa de bzhin du phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyi skye ba med pas kyang 'gag pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as things do not cease because they do not arise, external things also do not cease because they do not arise.

original: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dngos po thams cad la khyab pa yin gyi /ğŸ”½yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig la khyab kyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i dngos po thams cad la khyab pa yin gyi / yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig la khyab kyi /
translated: Moreover, the defining characteristics of the forward progression of this dependent origination that possesses the eight attributes such as nonarising pervade all things that are afflicted and pure.

original: rnam par byang ba'i dngos po la khyab pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i dngos po la khyab pa ma yin te /
translated: The defining characteristics of the forward progression of the twelve factors pervade only the things that are afflicted and do not pervade the things that are pure.

original: 'di ltar yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig la yod par zad kyi /ğŸ”½rnam par byang ba pa'i dngos po la med pa'i phyir dang / 'di'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'gag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po rnams la yang khyab la /
analyzed: 'di ltar yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig la yod par zad kyi / rnam par byang ba pa'i dngos po la med pa'i phyir dang / 'di'i lugs su 'byung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'gag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po rnams la yang khyab la /
translated: Thus the characteristics of the forward order of the twelve factors exist only in the things that are completely afflicted, such as â€œConditioned by ignorance, there are actions.â€ğŸ”½The characteristics of the reverse order pervade the things that are completely afflicted, such as â€œConditioned by birth, there is aging and death,â€ but they do not pervade the things that are completely purified.

original: skye ba med pa yod pas 'gag pa med pa yod ces bya ba la sogs pas rnam par byang ba pa'i dngos po rnams la yang khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba med pa yod pas 'gag pa med pa yod ces bya ba la sogs pas rnam par byang ba pa'i dngos po rnams la yang khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The characteristics of the forward order pervade the things that are completely purified, such as â€œIf birth does not exist, aging and death do not exist,â€ but they do not pervade the things that are completely afflicted.

original: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di'i rgyu'i rtsa ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid yin gyi
analyzed: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di'i rgyu'i rtsa ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid yin gyi
translated: Moreover, the root cause of this dependent origination possessing the eight attributes such as being unborn is the direct cause of all things that are afflicted and pure.

original: / yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi rgyu'i rtsa ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: / yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi rgyu'i rtsa ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid ma yin te /
translated: The root cause of the twelve factors is not the direct cause of all things that are afflicted.

original: 'di ltar yan lag bcu gnyis pa dag gi rgyu'i rtsa ba ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams nyi tshe'i mngon sum gyi rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar yan lag bcu gnyis pa dag gi rgyu'i rtsa ba ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams nyi tshe'i mngon sum gyi rgyu yin gyi /
translated: Thus the root cause of the twelve factors is ignorance, which is the direct cause of the limited formation.

original: yan lag lhag ma rnams kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang / 'di'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu'i rtsa ba skye ba yang 'gag pa la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid kyang yin la /
analyzed: yan lag lhag ma rnams kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang / 'di'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu'i rtsa ba skye ba yang 'gag pa la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid kyang yin la /
translated: because the remaining limbs are not the cause of the direct perception of the afflicted, and because the root cause of the afflicted, the arising of dependent origination, is also the cause of the direct perception of all the things that are afflicted, such as cessation, and so on.

original: rnam par byang ba pa'i rgyu'i rtsa ba skye ba med pa la yang 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa rnam par byang ba ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba pa'i rgyu'i rtsa ba skye ba med pa la yang 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa rnam par byang ba ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the root cause of the purified, the nonarising of dependent origination, is also the cause of the direct perception of all the things that are purified, such as the absence of cessation, and so on.

original: de ltar na rten cing 'brel @59b par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pas dmigs pa can khyod kyi gtan tshigs kyi don nyid ma
analyzed: de ltar na rten cing 'brel @59b par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pas dmigs pa can khyod kyi gtan tshigs kyi don nyid ma
translated: Thus, since this dependent origination endowed with the eight attributes, such as the nonarising of dependent origination, possesses all the characteristics of dependent origination, the object of your reason

translated: Therefore there is no fault in teaching that which is not ceased first and that which does not arise later.â€

original: 'dir yang de'i go rims bzhin du 'gag pa med pa dang por bstan pa'i rigs na /
analyzed: 'dir yang de'i go rims bzhin du 'gag pa med pa dang por bstan pa'i rigs na /
translated: Here, in accordance with that order, it would be logical to teach that which is not ceased first.

original: ci'i phyir skye ba med pa dang por bstan par 'dod ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skye ba med pa dang por bstan par 'dod ce na /
translated: Why do you assert that which does not arise is taught first?

original: de'i lan du 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /ğŸ”½sngar / 'gag pa med pa skye med pa //
analyzed: de'i lan du 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste / sngar / 'gag pa med pa skye med pa //
translated: In response to that, this is what should be said:ğŸ”½â€œSince samsara is beginningless, there is no fault in teaching that which is not ceased first and that which does not arise later.â€

original: zhes bstan pa la nyis pa med do zhes bshad pa ni @60b 'khor ba la thog ma med pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa ni skye ba'i rim pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir dang / don brtag pa yin pa'i phyir de skad bshad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa la nyis pa med do zhes bshad pa ni @60b 'khor ba la thog ma med pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa ni skye ba'i rim pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir dang / don brtag pa yin pa'i phyir de skad bshad pa yin gyi /
translated: This was explained earlier because it was a mere investigation of the meaning of the words.

original: 'dir de dag gi don bstan pa la ni skyes na 'gag par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'dir de dag gi don bstan pa la ni skyes na 'gag par 'gyur gyi /
translated: But here, in the teaching of the meaning of those words, that which arises ceases.

original: ma skyes na 'gag par mi 'gyur ba dang / skye ba rgyun chad pa'i mtshan nyid ni chad pa yin gyi /ğŸ”½ma skyes na chad par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa ma zhig pas rtag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ma skyes na 'gag par mi 'gyur ba dang / skye ba rgyun chad pa'i mtshan nyid ni chad pa yin gyi / ma skyes na chad par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa ma zhig pas rtag pa yin gyi /
translated: If it does not arise, it will not cease,ğŸ”½If it does not arise, it will not be terminated,

original: ma skyes na rtag par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa yul gzhan nas 'ong bas 'ong ba yin gyi /ğŸ”½ma skyes pa na 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa yul gzhan du 'gro bas 'gro ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ma skyes na rtag par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa yul gzhan nas 'ong bas 'ong ba yin gyi / ma skyes pa na 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa yul gzhan du 'gro bas 'gro ba yin gyi /
translated: If it does not arise, it will not be permanent,ğŸ”½If it does not arise, it will not come,ğŸ”½If it does not arise, it will not go,

original: ma skyes na 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa mtshan nyid tha dad pas don tha dad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ma skyes na 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa mtshan nyid tha dad pas don tha dad pa yin gyi /
translated: If it does not arise, it will not be different,ğŸ”½If it does not arise, it will not be the same.

original: ma skyes na don tha dad par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa mtshan nyid gcig pas don gcig pa yin gyi ma skyes na don gcig par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'gag pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi rgyu ni skye ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma skyes na don tha dad par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa mtshan nyid gcig pas don gcig pa yin gyi ma skyes na don gcig par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'gag pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi rgyu ni skye ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since arising is the cause of all of cessation and so on, it is the root of cyclic existence.

original: rgyu bkag na de'i 'bras bu rnams kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten yang phal cher skye ba la shin tu lhag par chags pa dang / skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin na /
analyzed: rgyu bkag na de'i 'bras bu rnams kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten yang phal cher skye ba la shin tu lhag par chags pa dang / skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin na /
translated: because if the cause is refuted, its effects will not arise, and because most of the world is very attached to arising and is fixated on arising.

original: bstan bcos 'di ni lhag par chags pa dang mngon par zhen pa spong ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / lhag par chags pa dang mngon par zhen pa spangs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bstan bcos 'di ni lhag par chags pa dang mngon par zhen pa spong ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / lhag par chags pa dang mngon par zhen pa spangs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: This treatise is engaged in order to abandon attachment and fixation, and if one abandons attachment and fixation, one will attain nirvana.

original: 'dir slob dpon skye ba med pa dang por bstan par bzhed do //
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon skye ba med pa dang por bstan par bzhed do //
translated: Therefore, the master wishes to teach nonarising first.

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i skye bar rnam par rtog pa mngon sum du mdzad de zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i skye bar rnam par rtog pa mngon sum du mdzad de zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, he says, â€œHaving actualized the conceptions of arising imagined by others.â€

original: de la gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i zhes bya ba ni don dam par na nyid kyi blo la skye ba rnam par rtog pa'i dgongs pa nyid mi mnga' bas /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i zhes bya ba ni don dam par na nyid kyi blo la skye ba rnam par rtog pa'i dgongs pa nyid mi mnga' bas /
translated: Here, â€œimagined by othersâ€ means that ultimately, the conception of arising does not exist in the mind of the master himself.

original: 'di ltar gzhan dag gis don dam par skye ba yod par yongs su brtags pa'i skye bar rnam par rtog pa gang dag yin pa de dag mngon sum du mdzad de zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan dag gis don dam par skye ba yod par yongs su brtags pa'i skye bar rnam par rtog pa gang dag yin pa de dag mngon sum du mdzad de zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, the phrase â€œhaving directly perceivedâ€ should be supplied in the following manner: â€œhaving directly perceived those conceptual thoughts that conceive of arising as ultimate arising.â€

original: skye bar rnam par rtog par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skye bar rnam par rtog par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase â€œconceptual thoughts of arisingâ€ should be supplied in the following manner:

original: rnam par rtog pa gang dag gis skye bar rnam par brtags shing gzung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni skye bar rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gang dag gis skye bar rnam par brtags shing gzung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni skye bar rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ste /
translated: â€œThose conceptual thoughts by means of which arising is imagined and apprehended are called conceptual thoughts of arising.â€

original: skye ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: skye ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is synonymous with the phrase â€œaspects of arising.â€

original: mngon sum du mdzad de zhes bya ba ni sems kyi mdun du bzhag pa mdzad pa ste dmigs par mdzad de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //ğŸ”½skye bar rnam par rtog @61a * //
analyzed: mngon sum du mdzad de zhes bya ba ni sems kyi mdun du bzhag pa mdzad pa ste dmigs par mdzad de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // skye bar rnam par rtog @61a * //
translated: The phrase â€œhaving directly perceivedâ€ should be supplied in the following manner: â€œhaving placed in the mind, having made the object of the mind.â€

original: pa de dag kyang gang zhe na /ğŸ”½de'i phyir 'di ltar skye bar smra ba dag las /
analyzed: pa de dag kyang gang zhe na / de'i phyir 'di ltar skye bar smra ba dag las /
translated: What are those conceptual thoughts of arising?ğŸ”½In response to this question, the text says, â€œIn this way, some assert that things arise from themselves.â€

original: kha cig ni dngos po rnams bdag las skye'o zhes zer /
analyzed: kha cig ni dngos po rnams bdag las skye'o zhes zer /
translated: Some assert that things arise from themselves.

original: gzhan dag ni gzhan las so zhes zer kha cig ni gnyi ga las so zhes zer /

analyzed: gzhan dag ni rgyu med pa las so zhes zer ba dag ces bya ba smras so ;

analyzed: / skye bar rnam par rtog pa de dag mngon sum du mdzad de'o //
translated: He directly perceived those conceptual thoughts of production.ğŸ”½When they are examined by reasoning and scripture,

analyzed: rigs pa dang lung dag gis brtags pa na zhes bya ba ni skye bar rnam par rtog pa da dag mngon sum du mdzad de rigs pa dang lung dag gis brtags pa na'o //

analyzed: de la rigs pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs dang / dpe 'jig rten dang lung la grags pa dag go //
translated: There, reasoning is the reasonings and examples that are known in the world and scripture.

analyzed: lung zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde mtha' dag ste /
translated: Scripture is the entire collection of sutras such as the perfection of wisdom sutras.

original: de las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: de las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis /

original: chos su btags pa de la skye ba yang med /
analyzed: chos su btags pa de la skye ba yang med /

analyzed: 'gag pa yang med de /

analyzed: ming dang brda tsam gyi tha snyad du brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa dag yin no //

analyzed: lung de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin par brjod par bya'i gzhan dag la ni lung gi mtshan nyid med de /

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

analyzed: lung ni yid ches tshig yin te /

analyzed: zhes bshad pa de lta bu ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir rigs pa dang lung de dag gis brtags pa na'o //

analyzed: 'thad pa mi bzod par zhes bya ba ni skye ba 'thad pa'i gtan tshigs yod par mi bzod par ro //

original: rang la nges pa zhes bya ba ni /

translated: â€œ Oneâ€™s own certaintyâ€ means

analyzed: slob dpon gyis gang gi tshe dngos po rnams kyi skye ba rnam pa de dag gis mi 'thad mi rigs par rtogs pa de'i tshe na /

analyzed: slob dpon nyid la don dam par chos thams cad skye ba med do zhes de kho na thugs su chud pa'i nges pa skyes par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: de'i dbang @61b gis zhes bya ba ni slob dpon rang la ngas pa skyes pa de'i dbang gis te /

analyzed: de'i dbang gis ji ltar bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de kho na rtogs pa da ltar sems can gzhan dag la yang bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas //
translated: Therefore, just as I have realized the reality of all phenomena, I will now teach it to other sentient beings.ğŸ”½Thinking this, he said:

analyzed: gnyis las ma yin rgyu med min ;

translated: Not from both, not without cause,ğŸ”½Nowhere do any entities

translated: The so-called â€œentire network of conceptual thoughtâ€ refers to the conceptual thought that things arise from self, other, both, or causelessly. Those are called the â€œentire network of conceptual thought.â€

original: dra ba zhes bya ba ni rtog pa ma lus pa de dag nyid du dra ba ste /
analyzed: dra ba zhes bya ba ni rtog pa ma lus pa de dag nyid du dra ba ste /
translated: The so-called â€œnetworkâ€ is that very entire network of conceptual thought.

analyzed: rtog pa ma lus pa'i dra ba dgag pa des so //
translated: The phrase â€œby means of the negation of the entire net of conceptual thoughtsâ€ means that.ğŸ”½The phrase â€œnonconceptual wisdom that possesses all objects of knowledge as its objectâ€ means that nonconceptual wisdom possesses all objects of knowledge as its object.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes shes bya yul ma lus pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gang la zhes bya ba shes par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / yongs su gcad par bya ba ma lus pa dang /

translated: The phrase â€œall objects of knowledgeâ€ refers to all objects of knowledge that are to be known, all objects of knowledge that are to be understood, and all objects of knowledge that are to be discerned.

analyzed: yul zhes bya ba spyod yul dang / gzung ba dang / dmigs pa ma lus pa / yod pa de ni rnam par me rtog pa'i ye shes shes bya yul ma lus pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: de 'grub par zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes shes bya yul ma lus pa dang ldan pa de 'grub par ro /

analyzed: dgongs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bzhed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / yang na med par dgag pa 'dis 'di ltar rtog pa ma lus pa'i dra ba dgag pas /
translated: â€œBecause of the intentionâ€ means â€œbecause of the wish.â€ğŸ”½Or, this negation is intended to establish nonconceptual wisdom, which is endowed with all objects of knowledge, by negating the entire network of conceptual thought.

translated: If one were to take a nonimplicative negation, since that would be primarily an affirmation, the statement â€œphenomena are not producedâ€ would be an affirmation, and thus the statement would be devoid of any purpose, since it would be teaching the existence of nonproduction.ğŸ”½This is what is being taught:

analyzed: med par dgag pa yongs su gzung ba mi byed na ni des na ma yin par dgag pa de sgrub pa gtso che ba'i phyir /

analyzed: dgag pa kho na tsam 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: it would not be the case that only a negation would be established.

translated: In that case, since the statement â€œphenomena are not producedâ€ would be an affirmation, it would be teaching the existence of nonproduction, and that is not the intention.

analyzed: 'di ltar mdzad pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: Thus, it is shown that it is free from the extreme of performance.

original: de sgrub pa gtso che ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ma yin par dgag pa de ni sgrub pa gtso med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de sgrub pa gtso che ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ma yin par dgag pa de ni sgrub pa gtso med pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po rnams skye ba med do zhes dgag pa'i sgo nas ma skyes pa yod do zhes sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, by way of negation, â€œThings are not produced,â€ there is the proof, â€œNon-production exists.â€

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir chos rnams ma skyes so zhes bsgrubs pas skye ba med pa ston pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir chos rnams ma skyes so zhes bsgrubs pas skye ba med pa ston pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, he says, â€œBecause of the proof, â€˜Things are not produced,â€™ the non-production is shown.â€

analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa de ni chos rnams ma skyes so zhes bsgrub pa'i sgo de nas skye ba med pa nyid yod par ston pa'i phyir sgrub pa gtso che ba yin no //
translated: That negative is preeminent in proof because of the proof, â€œThings are not produced,â€ by way of that door, it shows the existence of just non-production.

original: de ni 'dir mi bzhed de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'dir mi bzhed de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: That is not accepted here. Why?
